description: The aircraft, carrying air force cadets, was on a training flight when it came down near Kharkiv.
title: Ukraine military plane crash: Cadets among 26 people killed
title_page: Ukraine military plane crash: Cadets among 26 people killed - BBC News
maintext: "We have lost young cadets and experienced military servicemen who had their whole life ahead of them," he said. adding: "It is hard to choose the words to describe the pain of this loss."
